description.p: Prerequisite: Lupine
Your devotion to your craft is second to none and you’re a master of skill.

ul.li: Increase one ability score of your choice by 1, to a maximum of 20.
Choose a skill you are proficient in that uses the same attribute. You double your proficiency bonus for ability checks made using the chosen skill.

Whenever you roll a 20 on an ability check using the chosen skill, you have advantage on the next ability check made with that skill for the next hour. Once you’ve used this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

description.p: Your Strength score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
If you are proficient in Athletics, you double your proficiency bonus for Athletics checks.

Whenever you roll a 20 on an ability check using Athletics, you have advantage on the next ability check made with that skill for the next hour. Once you’ve used this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.
Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any Athletics check you make.

Whenever you roll a 20 on an Athletics ability check, you have advantage on the next ability check made with that skill for the next hour. Once you’ve used this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

description.p: Prerequisite: Angeling
You’ve come into your wings fully, able to pull off agile maneuvers in midair.

ul.li: Your fly speed increases by 10 feet.
You have advantage on Dexterity saving throws as long as you are at least 20 feet in the air.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Dexterity saving throws as long as you are at least 20 feet in the air.

description.p: Prerequisite: Pixie
Your small size and ability to squeeze into tight places makes you a great spy.

ul.li: You gain proficiency in the Stealth skill. If you are already proficient in the skill, you add double your proficiency bonus to checks you make with it.
As long as you are not moving while hidden, creatures have disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to spot you.

sheet.description: As long as you are not moving while hidden, creatures have disadvantage on Perception checks to spot you.

description.p: Prerequisite: Pixie
Your diminutive stature and graceful flight allows you deftly avoid incoming blows.

ul.li: Your Dexterity increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You do not provoke opportunity attacks while you are flying.

sheet.description: You do not provoke opportunity attacks while you are flying.

description.p: Prerequisite: Lupine
Your feel right at home in battle, allowing you to better handle tough situations with allies.

ul.li: Increase your Intelligence or Wisdom score by 1, to a maximum of 20.

Whenever you have advantage on an ability check or saving throw, you may grant advantage to an allied creature within 10 feet of you on their next attack roll or saving throw before the end of your next turn. Once you’ve used this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a short or long rest.

sheet.description: Whenever you have advantage on an ability check or saving throw, you may grant advantage to an allied creature within 10 feet of you on their next attack roll or saving throw before the end of your next turn.

description.p: Prerequisite: Angeling
Your eternal youth allows you to pass as a normal child as well as hide your wings.

ul.li: Your Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
You have advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks to fool others into believing you are a normal child.

Whenever you cast an illusion spell on yourself that changes your appearance, such as the disguise self spell, you can choose to fold your wings around yourself as the somatic component. When you do, the spell to disguises them as a cloak or poncho that holds up against nonmagical means of detection, such as an Intelligence (Investigation) check.

sheet.description: You have advantage on Deception checks to fool others into believing you are a normal child. Whenever you cast an illusion spell on yourself that changes your appearance, such as the disguise self spell, you can choose to fold your wings around yourself as the somatic component. When you do, the spell to disguises them as a cloak or poncho that holds up against nonmagical means of detection, such as an Investigation check.
